HotelElement.Name: Petit Palace Arturo Soria (Formerly High Tech)

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Petit Palace Arturo Soria in Madrid (Ciudad Lineal), you'll be minutes from Alcala Norte and close to Arturo Soria Plaza Shopping Center. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Las Ventas and Centro Comercial Campo de las Naciones.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 44 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access is available. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Additional features include babysitting/childcare, wedding services, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and a computer station. Planning an event in Madrid? This hotel has 2001 square feet (186 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.
